name: Champagne Etiquette
simple_desc: Inflicts Besotted on all enemies and deals Fire DMG to them at the same time. Enhances this unit's next Basic ATK to Nectar Blitz.
desc: Inflicts Besotted on all enemies, lasting for #2[i] turn(s). At the same time, deals Fire DMG equal to #1[i]% of Gallagher's ATK to all enemies, and enhances this unit's next Basic ATK to Nectar Blitz.
